name: Biff & ball
description:
Help Biff to escape the prison. But wait.. he's chained to a ball! Can you figure out a  way to get him out there? Too bad he always skipped leg day.. 

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Space to pick up or drop items
  • Mouse drag to throw things
  • R to restart level
  • Esc to get to main menu
